welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zyrardow, the charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its beauty and experience all that Zyrardow has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warsaw Babice Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Warsaw Babice Airport, used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free and unlimited access throughout the airport.
